fields.description: Reservation resource id that the original resource gets swapped to. Format of the resource id is /providers/microsoft.capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}
fields.name: SwapDestination

fields.description: Resource id of the source reservation that gets swapped. Format of the resource id is /providers/microsoft.capacity/reservationOrders/{reservationOrderId}/reservations/{reservationId}
fields.name: SwapSource
